instructions: Put the plate in the middle of the charger
Put the napkin in the middle of the plate
put the dinner fork on the left side of the charger with the prongs facing upwards
put the salad fork on the left side of the dinner fork with the prongs facing upwards
put the dinner knife on the right side of the charger with the blade facing upwards
put the tea spoon on the right side of the dinner knife with the bowl facing upwards
put the soup spoon on the right side of the tea spoon with the bowl facing upwards
put the water glass above the charger towards the right side
put the wine glass on the right side of the water glass above the tea spoon
put the wine glass above the soup spoon, right below the other wine glass
put the the coffee cup above the soup spoon to the right of the wine glass
put the bread plate above the charger towards the left side
put the butter knife on the bread plate with the blade facing left
put the dessert fork above the charger next to the bread plate with the prongs facing right
put the dessert spoon below the dessert fork with the bowl facing left
